item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:36, topic:26588”]No, you see, if you understood it, then you wouldn’t worry about going to hell. The only thing that you need to go to heaven is faith in Jesus. That’s it. Jesus accounted for your sins already, so you shouldn’t worry about going to hell or anything else for that matter. But because you believe in Jesus, you don’t want to do bad stuff.

And wouldn’t it feel nice not to worry about death? Wouldn’t it be nice to know that anything you do in this life doesn’t matter at all? But whatever. Idk.[/quote]
Nah, I find it easier to just not worry about an afterlife (or lack of) in general. I just want to enjoy my life any way I can.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

No, you see, if you understood it, then you wouldn’t worry about going to hell. The only thing that you need to go to heaven is faith in Jesus. That’s it. Jesus accounted for your sins already, so you shouldn’t worry about going to hell or anything else for that matter. But because you believe in Jesus, you don’t want to do bad stuff.

And wouldn’t it feel nice not to worry about death? Wouldn’t it be nice to know that anything you do in this life doesn’t matter at all? But whatever. Idk.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:34, topic:26588”]All right. I see what you mean. But what is your understanding of Christianity? What decides whether you go to heaven or hell? So many people give up religion because they don’t understand it.

And don’t see this as me trying to convert you or anything. Just view this as an intelligent discussion.[/quote]
I understand it. But I believe Jesus talked in metaphors, but everyone took him too literal. Next thing you know, it’s a religion. I think he meant “God” as in nature, and he was the son of god (not “God” as an entity), as we all are.

I know that may sound confusing, but I think of us all as a hair on god’s (again, not “God” as in a specific entity) head. So there really is no one supreme being.

And nah, it’s cool. I know you’re not trying to convert me, you haven’t said “be Christian before I kill you lol” or anything.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

All right. I see what you mean. But what is your understanding of Christianity? What decides whether you go to heaven or hell? So many people give up religion because they don’t understand it.

And don’t see this as me trying to convert you or anything. Just view this as an intelligent discussion.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:32, topic:26588”]Catholics don’t represent Christianity. They actually imo embody the worst people of all religions. Think about them trying to convert you in this way. They found out this really cool script for rs, and of course, all they want to do is share it with you. They don’t mean anything ill (and btw, thats not hypocrisy), they just want to help you out.

I completely understand the resentment towards Christianity. It’s simply a name nowadays, but I doubt there are a million true Christians out of the 6 billion people in the world.[/quote]
Well, the thing is, I do not want anyone to “share” Christianity with me. It took me a LONG time (about 1 year) to give it up, because I was afraid of going to hell and whatnot. Now that I have given up on religion, I have been a much happier person in general.

But for the Christians who do not try to convert, nor “share” Christianity with me, I appreciate it, and I have a lot of respect for you. Thank you.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Catholics don’t represent Christianity. They actually imo embody the worst people of all religions. Think about them trying to convert you in this way. They found out this really cool script for rs, and of course, all they want to do is share it with you. They don’t mean anything ill (and btw, thats not hypocrisy), they just want to help you out.

I completely understand the resentment towards Christianity. It’s simply a name nowadays, but I doubt there are a million true Christians out of the 6 billion people in the world.

Read full topic

item.title: Are you a Christian?
item.dc:creator: @Zach1188 Zach1188
item.description:
@Zach1188 wrote:

xxlegitxx:

Christians are not hypocrites. True Christians aren’t. Don’t generalize by looking at all the fake-Christians out there.

Oh really? Than how come I always get catholics that try to convert me? I have never run across a single Christian of any form that just left me alone.

See, I know a lot of people that are Christians (most of my family), and I never try to get them to give up Christianity. So I wish they could show me the same respect.

Read full topic
